import java.util.*;
public class Main { 
public static boolean isSorted(int[] arr, int i) {
	if(i==arr.length-1) {

		return true;
	//	System.out.println("Element not found in the given array,Please write the correct data");
	}
	if(arr[i]>arr[i+1]){
		return false;
	}
	//if(arr[i]<arr[i+1]) 
		return isSorted(arr,i+1);
	
}


	public static void main(String [] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
   int  [] arr= {2,5,7,8,9,10};
   
 System.out.println(isSorted(arr,0));
}

}
